config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code is using the defaultEscape value from the settings of the database to set the search string escape character.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The DEFAULT_ESCAPE configuration is triggered whenever the getSearchStringEscape() method is called or when the CompareLike constructor is invoked with the defaultEscape parameter.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the DEFAULT_ESCAPE configuration option is that it determines the escape character used for search strings, which can affect the behavior of search operations in the system.
